name: Muczące drzewa
description:
Gameplay consists of quick duels and in automatically starts new game after one player wins

One player uses WSAD to move and Space to jump

Second player uses Arrow keys to move and 0 from NumPad to jump

You can eat things smaller than you including second player, but don't be greedy.
